description.narrative: Project objectives are to : a) contribute to the Government's food self sufficiency programme; b) increase Lesotho's foreign exchange earnings; c) improve the income and living standards of participating farmers; and d) improve the social life of rural community of the Phuthiatsana River Valley.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - rural devt
